columns.Age: Age of the student in years.
columns.Sex: Gender of the student, represented by a single character.
columns.Major: Numeric representation of the student's major field of study.
columns.Advisor: Numeric identifier for the student's academic advisor.
columns.city_code: Three-letter code representing the city of student residence.

Student.table_description: The Student table contains essential information about students, including their names, age, gender, academic major, academic advisor, and city of residence, each identified by a unique student ID.

columns.StuID: A unique identifier assigned to each student participating in the voting process.
columns.Registration_Date: The date on which the student registered to vote.
columns.Election_Cycle: The academic term during which the election occurs, such as Spring or Fall.
columns.President_Vote: The identifier of the student vote cast for the position of President.
columns.Vice_President_Vote: The identifier of the student vote cast for the position of Vice President.
columns.Secretary_Vote: The identifier of the student vote cast for the position of Secretary.
columns.Treasurer_Vote: The identifier of the student vote cast for the position of Treasurer.
columns.Class_President_Vote: The identifier of the student vote cast for the Class President position.
columns.Class_Senator_Vote: The identifier of the student vote cast for the Class Senator position.

Voting_record.table_description: The Voting_record table captures the voting information of students, including their unique identifiers, registration details, election cycles, and votes for various elected positions.
